ioctl.h
1 /* Copyright 2011; All Rights Reserved
2  * Please see http://www.coactionos.com/license.html for
3  * licensing information.
4  */
5 
6 #ifndef _DEV_IOCTL_H_
7 #define _DEV_IOCTL_H_
8 
9 #define _IOCTLPARM_MASK 0x3FFF
10 #define _IOCTLTYPE_MASK 0xFFFF
11 #define _IOCTLIDENT_MASK 0xFF
12 #define _IOCTLNUM_MASK 0xFF
13 #define _IOCTL_ROOT 0x20000000
14 #define _IOCTL_IN 0x40000000
15 #define _IOCTL_OUT 0x80000000
16 #define _IOCTL_INOUT (_IOCTL_IN | _IOCTL_OUT)
17 #define _IOCTL_VOID 0
18 
19 #define _IOCTL(x,y) ((x << 8) | (y) | ((0 & _IOCTLPARM_MASK) << 16) | _IOCTL_VOID)
20 #define _IOCTLR(x,y,t) ((x << 8) | (y) | ((sizeof(t) & _IOCTLPARM_MASK) << 16) | _IOCTL_OUT)
21 #define _IOCTLW(x,y,t) ((x << 8) | (y) | ((sizeof(t) & _IOCTLPARM_MASK) << 16) | _IOCTL_IN)
22 #define _IOCTLRW(x,y,t) ((x << 8) | (y) | ((sizeof(t) & _IOCTLPARM_MASK) << 16) | _IOCTL_INOUT)
23 
24 
25 #define _IOCTL_NUM(i) ((i) & _IOCTLNUM_MASK)
26 #define _IOCTL_IDENT(i) (((i) >> 8) & _IOCTLIDENT_MASK)
27 #define _IOCTL_SIZE(i) (((i) >> 16) & _IOCTLPARM_MASK)
28 #define _IOCTL_IOCTLR(i) ((i) & _IOCTL_OUT)
29 #define _IOCTL_IOCTLRW(i) ((i) & _IOCTL_INOUT)
30 #define _IOCTL_IOCTLW(i) ((i) & _IOCTL_IN)
31 
32 #endif /* _DEV_IOCTL_H_ */
